    • Constructor Detail

      • Exam

        public Exam()
        Default constructor. Initializes an unlocked exam. Exams must be locked before they will be accepted by the viewer.

      • Exam

        protected Exam(boolean reportingStats,
    boolean reportingStatsStandalone,
    java.lang.String statsDestinationEmail,
    java.lang.String statsSenderEmail,
    java.lang.String statsSenderPassword,
    java.lang.String statsSenderSMTPAddress,
    int statsSenderSMTPPort)
        Advanced constructor. Initializes an unlocked exam. Exams must be locked before they will be accepted by the viewer.
        Parameters:
        reportingStats - if the exam will report statistics upon completion
        reportingStatsStandalone - if the exam is reporting statistics, will it do so standalone
        statsDestinationEmail - the email destination of the statistics. After statistics are compiled, they will be bundled and sent to an email address to be analyzed later. This is the destination of this data.
        statsSenderEmail - if reporting standalone, the email account that will send the statistics to the destination. Can be the same as the destination. DO NOT USE A PERSONAL/PROFESSIONAL EMAIL
        statsSenderPassword - if reporting standalone, the password to the email account that will send the statistics. DO NOT USE A PERSONAL/PROFESSIONAL EMAIL
        statsSenderSMTPAddress - the SMTP server address of the sender email account
        statsSenderSMTPPort - the port of the SMTP server of the sender email account

      • Exam

        Exam(boolean reportingStats,
    boolean reportingStatsStandalone,
    java.lang.String statsDestinationEmail,
    java.lang.String statsSenderEmail,
    java.lang.String statsSenderPassword,
    java.lang.String statsSenderSMTPAddress,
    int statsSenderSMTPPort,
    boolean isLocked)
        Advanced constructor. Initializes an unlocked exam. Exams must be locked before they will be accepted by the viewer.
        Parameters:
        reportingStats - if the exam will report statistics upon completion
        reportingStatsStandalone - if the exam is reporting statistics, will it do so standalone
        statsDestinationEmail - the email destination of the statistics. After statistics are compiled, they will be bundled and sent to an email address to be analyzed later. This is the destination of this data.
        statsSenderEmail - if reporting standalone, the email account that will send the statistics to the destination. Can be the same as the destination. DO NOT USE A PERSONAL/PROFESSIONAL EMAIL
        statsSenderPassword - if reporting standalone, the password to the email account that will send the statistics. DO NOT USE A PERSONAL/PROFESSIONAL EMAIL
        statsSenderSMTPAddress - the SMTP server address of the sender email account
        statsSenderSMTPPort - the port of the SMTP server of the sender email account
        isLocked - if the exam will be locked
